name: Into The Cold
description:
Into the cold is an adventure based horror game consisting of many features such as a basic crafting/item collecting system, an interactive environment,  enemies, and sub-missions to assist with the story.

Game Genre - Adventure/Horror

Controls  [SPACE] to talk/change current objective  [ESC] to pause [ARROW KEYS] to move

Bio - Campbell Parkinson is currently a student studying at Media Design School for a bachelor of creative technology based in New Zealand. Any feedback on this prototype is much appreciated.

Instructions - Download the "Zip" file > open the file > select "IntoTheCold" > Extract all > open the "IntoTheCold" application.
